Text:
"The serial number you have entered is a valid Nero serial, but not valid for this application". 

It's hard to test a trial product when you can't actually launch it.  

Could we have the right numbers, please?

@blacktroy, when i input serial # 9004-027E-UM18-71C6-57TK-P034-UU8X-0U4A  get message saying it is invalid,  and free trial ends in 4 days from 3-22-12-- can you help?
 thanks!
